content: That's really helpful. I've been thinking about how to incorporate meditation and mindfulness into my daily routine, and combining it with my yoga practice seems like a great way to do that. I've also been reflecting on my experience at the Buddhist mindfulness retreat I attended last week, led by Bhante Bodhi, where we practiced meditation and yoga. It was a really transformative experience, and I'd like to continue exploring the teachings and principles in my daily life.
